body: LEAD: DEAR Diary: DEAR Diary: I was walking west on 66th Street from Lexington Avenue, a thoroughfare usually trafficked by cabs dropping off fares at the Cosmopolitan Club or, the week this story took place, cabs and limousines taking vistors to the winter antiques show at the armory across the way. On this particular night, however, one couldn't
title: METROPOLITAN DIARY
